name: address
description: The facility address.

name: certificate_number
description: The Operating Certificate Number of the facility.

name: city
description: Refers to the city in which the facility is located.

name: classification
description: The classification of the Adult Care Facility. NFP: Not for Profit. PPHA: Private Proprietary Home for Adults.

name: county
description: Refers to the county in which the facility is located.

name: facility_id
description: The ID of the facility.

name: facility_name
description: The facility name.

name: fax
description: Refers to the facsimile number of the facility.

name: number_of_beds
description:
Refers to the maximum number of ACF beds allowed. These
beds are certified by the NYSDOH under Article 7 of the New
York State Public Health Law.

name: operator
description: Refers to the operator of the facility.

name: phone
description: Refers to the phone number of the facility.

name: regional_office
description: The Department of Healthâ€™s regional office that the Adult Care Facility is within. CDRO: Capital District Regional Office. CNYRO: Central New York Regional Office. MARO: Metropolitan Area Regional Office. WRO: Western Regional Office.

name: type
description: The type of Adult Care Facility. AH: Adult Home. ALP: Assisted Living Program. EHP: Enriched Housing Program.

name: zip
description: Refers to the zip code in which the facility is located.

name: assisted_living_program_beds
description:
Refers to the maximum number of Assisted Living Programs
(ALP) beds allowed.

name: assisted_living_residence_alr_beds
description:
Refers to the maximum number of Assisted Living Residence
(ALR) beds allowed.

name: enhanced_alr_beds
description:
Refers to the maximum number of Enhanced Assisted Living
Residence (EALR) beds allowed.

name: special_needs_alr_beds
description:
Refers to the maximum number of Special Needs Assisted
Living Residence (SNALR) beds allowed.

name: record_date
description: time when record was added.

name: ingestion_timestamp
description: time when record was ingested.
